page.title: Gangster Cult Shields Venezuelans from Crime
page.text: <p></p><p> By Fabian Andres Cambero</p><p> CARACAS, Venezuela (Reuters) - As the setting sun castslong shadows over a Caracas cemetery, crime-weary Venezuelanspray at the tomb of the notorious thief Ismael, believing heand other dead gangsters can protect them against violentattacks and robberies.</p>
